attributes.name: annotationsModalOpened
attributes.description: Whether or not the Glade dialog is currently opened

attributes.name: loginErrorMessage
attributes.description: The current login form error message

attributes.name: email
attributes.description: the email currently being used to sign in

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: the password currently being used to sign in

attributes.name: pendingAnnotationBody
attributes.description: the body of the annotation that is currently being composed

attributes.name: pendingGladeDomNodeHash
attributes.description: the index of the referrent DOM node for the pending annotation

attributes.name: annotations
attributes.description: an array of all annotations for this document
attributes.type: { body: string; gladeDomNodeHash: number; postedBy: string | undefined; }[]

attributes.name: activeAnnotations
attributes.description: an array of all annotations that are currently listed for the selected referrent
attributes.type: { body: string; gladeDomNodeHash: number; postedBy: string | undefined; }[]

attributes.name: dialogRole
attributes.description:
the current UI mode of the Glade dialog
List, Create, or Login

properties.name: annotationsModalOpened
properties.description: Whether or not the Glade dialog is currently opened

properties.name: loginErrorMessage
properties.description: The current login form error message

properties.name: firebaseConfig
properties.description: An object with all firebase configuration options, traditionally this config should not be published, but the embeddable nature of <glade-component> seems to be an exception
properties.type: { apiKey: string; authDomain: string; databaseURL: string; projectId: string; storageBucket: string; messagingSenderId: string; appId: string; }

properties.name: email
properties.description: the email currently being used to sign in

properties.name: password
properties.description: the password currently being used to sign in

properties.name: pendingAnnotationBody
properties.description: the body of the annotation that is currently being composed

properties.name: pendingGladeDomNodeHash
properties.description: the index of the referrent DOM node for the pending annotation

properties.name: annotations
properties.description: an array of all annotations for this document
properties.type: { body: string; gladeDomNodeHash: number; postedBy: string | undefined; }[]

properties.name: activeAnnotations
properties.description: an array of all annotations that are currently listed for the selected referrent
properties.type: { body: string; gladeDomNodeHash: number; postedBy: string | undefined; }[]

properties.name: dialogRole
properties.description:
the current UI mode of the Glade dialog
List, Create, or Login

properties.name: loginTemplate
properties.description: the template to display when in Login DialogRole

properties.name: createAnnotationTemplate
properties.description: the template to display when in Create DialogRole

properties.name: annotationsListTemplate
properties.description: the template to display when in List DialogRole

properties.name: modalContent
properties.description: the current template to display in the dialog

properties.name: gladeContentNodes
properties.description: The content nodes inside the tag
